text: Nakajihola misenga mili mibuguma na kujidumula vihande vihande, hamba nakavilajiza vihande avyo kukolela wasenga kuli Isilaeli yeng'ha, wowikula, “Munhu yoneche yohambe yawawinze kumbele kwa Sauli na Samweli, misenga ja heye joditigwa hihi!” Kwa kukolela mbuli ayi, Mkulu Nguluwi nakawadita wanhu wa Isilaeli wadumbe, ahyo weng'ha nawalawa hamwe.
